taskbody.context:
GitHub account is required for accessing GitHub repository providing you;
Packaged development ready for installation,
Collaborative projects,
Documentation,
Notifications on project news and issues.

step.cmd: Go to https://github.com/join . Use your Temenos email as user name and choose a password.
Email mvorburger or aphethean your GitHub UID, one of them will grant you access.

taskbody.result: You should be able to access to the https://github.com/temenostech/Hothouse repository.
